name: Resquared
headline: Marketing automation platform for selling to local businesses.
description:
Local businesses were the hardest B2B segment to reach, but account for over 60% firms in the U.S.
Our SaaS application has data on every local business that are easy to get in touch with using our specialized marketing automation tools and workflows. 
Resquared has been proven to save sales pro's over 3 hours per day and result in 53% stronger leads (case study on website).

# Schedule your demo
Discover why Resquared is the fastest and most effective way to reach local businesses
## Data on over 12 million local businesses
Less than 10% of local businesses are on LinkedIn, and 60% of all businesses in the US are NOT on LinkedIn. Resquared has data on all of them.We update our database regularly to ensure you can connect directly with small businesses
[Learn More](http://re2.ai/</platform/database>)
![Smiling woman wearing apron, holding coffee cup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666309fce7f3ee3f38470e30_photo-featured-data-nobg.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/66630a27a82fbc4a88f455d2_ui-featured-data.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666309831e1d5cfe659cadf3_photo-featured-data.webp)

## Automate personalized, high quality outreach
Get assistance with your day-to-day prospecting with Resquared's Pipeline ManagementWe help integrate every stage of the sales flow, from discovery to winning your deal
[Learn More](http://re2.ai/</platform/prospecting>)
## Review Your Outreach Analytics
Having trouble trying to keep track of your outreach? Our analytics dashboard automatically tracks all of your messages, keeping them stored and organizedSend weekly reports for better visibility into your results, and set benchmarks for yourself to continue to gather leads
[Learn More](http://re2.ai/</platform/analytics>)
![Two businessmen in suits analyzing data on a laptop.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/6663161e6b25507a22244dc9_photo-featured-analytics-nobg.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/6663161ad9c8cb3dfc7ac7c4_ui-featured-analytics.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666316208c03a5688fa2191e_photo-featured-analytics.webp)

## Connect Through Social Media
Would you prefer to speak directly with a business through their social media page?With our prospecting tool, we offer information on local businesses and their social media pages
[Learn More](http://re2.ai/</platform/socialmedia>)

## See how our customers succeed with Resquared
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca55753533e1fbcac12_testimonial-joeknopp.jpg)

“I just love your platform. I literally set up my whole week in 30 minutes. And I just let it send it. It's awesome.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666ae02e92fffcac608e3b95_testimonial-mike.jpg)
### [Mike StewartFounder at Rise LocalMarketing Agency](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kevincandlish_resquared-selling-to-local-businesses-activity-6849777420602544129-t7K1?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
"We just had our best sales month ever, and I need to thank Resquared and their customer success team. We've seen a 20-30 percent growth compared to the previous month, all thanks to using Resquared's prospecting tool to find great local businesses to work with in our marketing campaigns."
### [Devin MorrisCEO at GoGet My LaundryLaundry Services](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kevincandlish_resquared-selling-to-local-businesses-activity-6849777420602544129-t7K1?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
“After just one week using Resquared, I got 3 deals in less than 30 minutes.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca50fb7367382998902_testimonial-kevin.jpg)
### [Kevin CandlishSenior Property Manager at SVR Commercial, LLCCommercial Real Estate](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/kevincandlish_resquared-selling-to-local-businesses-activity-6849777420602544129-t7K1?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
“Resquared has blown me away. I've been able to target and contact more prospects this first week than I ever imagined I could in such a short amount of time. I have always been a canvass by the biggest numbers guy. The more prospects I reach the better the odds of getting deals done. My odds have just increased dramatically and I will easily reach more tenants this year than any of my previous 30 years in this great business of ours!”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca5534d4248251d2b4a_testimonial-brian.jpg)
### [Brian LandruSenior Leasing Representative at Regency CentersCommercial Real Estate](http://re2.ai/<https:/blog.re2.ai/regencycasestudy>)
“We began using Resquared to fill it and within 3 days, we contacted 40 businesses and had a 60% open rate through the platform. We were very impressed as we had 3 immediate responses from business owners within the first 24 hours, one of which became the tenant, Hollywood Beauty.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666ae0256e867f6bb38648c4_testimonial-mara.jpg)
### [Mara FrumkinBroker at Atlantic RetailCommercial Real Estate](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/marafrumkin/>)
“When we send out 500 emails, we got 40 responses. It makes you look super impressive to a landlord. Your certainly cannot reach out to the same amount of volume alone that you can with Resquared.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca5744fb9493080f6b3_testimonial-terri.jpg)
### [Terri CoxSenior VP & Director of BrokerageCommercial Real Estate](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/matanky-realty-group_proptech-commercialrealestate-commercialbrokers-activity-6905232769039900672-uo4M?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
"We learned about Resquared at a demo during ICSC in December, and it sounded too good to be true. After just a week of using the technology for a property we've struggled to find ideal targets for in Chicago, we now have at least 3 strong leads and are excited to dig in deeper. Resquared is providing faster, stronger results for targeted use than any other prospecting tool we have seen. It's a great option to help us save time and be more focused with our leasing efforts.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca5eb430807f000550b_testimonial-hquiin.jpg)
### [H. Quinn ClevelandReal Estate Manager at SCALECommercial Real Estate](http://re2.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/h-quinn-cleveland-548a89151_resquared-selling-to-local-businesses-activity-6920474293789208576-g4Ew?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>)
“Thank you Resquared for making prospecting and cold calling a simple and easy task with just a click of a button. Ive used it for a few days now and I am very happy with the results.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666ae03a18b5623fef322a80_testimonial-daryl.jpg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e8637b7b960748d829a775/666afca5880cdd9a38423b7d_testimonial-steve.jpg)

Plus, I have a third business owner who wants help with finding a third location in their target area, we meet on Monday! The time savings you get while prospecting and the increase in results have been very impressive.”

generated_description:
### Resquared: The Future of Local Business Outreach

**Overview**  
Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2021 batch, Resquared is a marketing automation platform that’s on a mission: to streamline how businesses sell to local firms. It’s rooted in a well-recognized challenge—the fact that local businesses represent over 60% of firms in the U.S. but are notoriously difficult to reach. With their SaaS application, the company has taken the first step towards bridging that gap.

**What They Do**  
Resquared provides an extensive database of local businesses, allowing sales professionals to effortlessly connect with potential leads. Their tools focus on marketing automation, offering workflows that enable users to save time and enhance outreach efficiency. On average, Resquared helps sales professionals reclaim over three hours every day and has been associated with a whopping 53% increase in lead strength, as showcased in their case studies on the website.

**Core Features**  
- **Extensive Local Business Database**: Data on over 12 million local businesses, many of which aren’t on LinkedIn.
- **Email Prospecting Tools**: Streamlined outreach that increases engagement.
- **Sales Pipeline Management**: Helps users easily track and manage their sales efforts.
- **Outreach Analytics**: Offers insights into engagement levels and success rates.
- **Social Media Outreach**: Leverages social media platforms for direct communication with prospects.

These features collectively empower users to maximize their outreach and streamline the lead management process.

**Location and Team**  
Resquared is based in Philadelphia, PA, and boasts a team of around 40 dedicated employees. This small but mighty group is supported by Dalton Caldwell, their Group Partner at Y Combinator, adding a layer of credibility and mentorship to their growth trajectory.

**Market Position**  
Tagged across various domains such as SaaS, B2B, sales, proptech, and marketing, Resquared positions itself uniquely in the realm of local business outreach. Their offering fits perfectly for sectors that depend on direct interaction with local entities, including real estate, service industries, and beyond.

**Customer Testimonials**  
Feedback from users reflects strong satisfaction. Joe Knopp from Quiet Box stated, “I just love your platform.
